Title: S’Court’s verdict on emergency rule unsettles polity, power structure
Summary: S’Court’s verdict on emergency rule unsettles polity, power structure . President Bola Tinubu's constitutional authority to declare a state of emergency, may have closed the book on Rivers State's emergency .

Title: Yuletide: Can technology salvage Lagos’ N3.8tr loss to traffic yearly?
Summary: Despite efforts to control vehicular traffic in Lagos State, gridlock remains a daily reality . Matters are made worse during festive seasons and rush hours .

Title: Tinubu, Sanwo-Olu  reaffirm support for armed forces
Summary: Tinubu, Sanwo-Olu reaffirm commitment to welfare, professionalism and operational effectiveness of the Nigerian Armed Forces . President Bola Tinubu reaffirmed his administration’s unwavering commitment to the welfare of the military .

Title: ARCON, NIPR partner on professionalism, excellence
Summary: Director General Advertising Regulatory Council of Nigeria (ARCON) has developed Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with members of the Nigerian Institute of Public Relations . ARCON, NIPR partner on professionalism, excellence, says Olalekan Fadolapo .

Summary: Uncle Sam Amuka unfolds today, December 16, 2025, as the inaugural Uncle Sam Amuka (USA) Art Exhibition opens at the Alexis Gallery .

Title: Youth engagement key to blue economy success — Tinubu’s aide
Summary: Dada Olusegun said the success of the administration’s blue economy vision depends on how well young Nigerians understand and identify with it . The Special Adviser to President Bola Tinubu on Social Media said the blue economy is anchored on growth, job creation and global competitiveness .

Title: USA Exhibition: Christmas comes early @ Alexis Galleries
Summary: Today, December 16, 2025, is the opening of the much-awaited Uncle Sam Art Exhibition . The exhibition runs till December 20, 2025 .

Title: Osimhen: From Lagos newspaper seller to stardom with Nigeria
Summary: He failed to score in 14 matches and was loaned to Charleroi, where he rediscovered his scoring touch . Osimhen: From Lagos newspaper seller to stardom with Nigeria .

Title: 132 Nigerian firms secured N51.7bn, $359m in local content funds – NCDMB
Summary: 132 Nigerian companies have accessed N51.785bn and $359.653m from local content intervention funds . NCDMB Director of Corporate Services, Abdulmalik Halilu, said the funding has significantly increased local participation in the sector, rising from 44% three years ago to 61% this year .

Title: Trump sues BBC for $10bn over documentary speech edit
Summary: US President Donald Trump on Monday filed a lawsuit seeking at least $10 billion from the BBC over a documentary that edited his 2021 speech to supporters ahead of the US Capitol riot . Title: Fire guts Gombe timber market, gov orders probe, pledges support
Summary: Gombe State Governor, Muhammadu Inuwa Yahaya, has ordered an immediate investigation and emergency relief measures . The inferno, which occurred on Monday night after traders had closed for the day, razed several shops and goods . Title: Police foil robbery in Enugu, arrest 28-year-old with fake firearm
Summary: The Enugu State Police Command on Monday prevented an armed robbery and arrested 28-year-old Chimuanya Oshim near Agric Bank Bus Stop, Independence Layout, in Enugu metropolis .
